title: Ronan (Part 2)
body:
Ronan (Part 2)

Evan came back to his hotel room through the same window from which he left earlier. After arriving in the room, he saw Kazil standing in one of the corners.

Evan looked at him for a moment before shifting his gaze to the unconscious person who was lying on the ground in front of Kazil.

The person who was lying on the ground was the nameless host who was hosting the tournament.

While coming back to Central City, Evan actually thought that the nameless host would definitely run away after receiving the news that he was safely able to escape from the Dark Guild.

He asked Sebastian and Nathan about the details of this nameless host. Since this guy is an A+ rank hunter, Sebastian and Nathan were fully aware of him and gave him all the information that he needed.

According to them, this guy works for the Hunter Association and if he wants to meet him, he should go Hunter Association building to look for him.
